document.full_text: the united states vowed on tuesday to "get to the bottom" of whether pakistan helped osama bin laden elude a long manhunt before he was killed in a u.s. raid, even as islamabad denied it gave shelter to the al qaeda leader.
document.title: u.s. seeks answers on whether pakistan aided bin laden
lines_and_colors: the united states vowed on tuesday to "get to the bottom" of whether pakistan helped osama bin laden elude a long manhunt before he was killed in a u.s. raid, even as islamabad denied it gave shelter to the al qaeda leader.
